_meanings:
{@--1@} A name, appellation (as
last member of <ab>comp.</ab>); {#kAvyaM#} 
{#rAmAyaRAhvayaM#} <ls>Rām.</ls>; {#cakrasAhvayaM#}, 
{#caraRAhvayAH; vfdDerapyAhvayA ime#} <ls>Ak.</ls>

{@--2@} A 
lawsuit arising from a dispute about
games with animals, as 
cock-fighting &c.; (one of the 18 titles of
law); {#paRapUrvakapakzimezAdiyoDanaM AhvayaH#}
<ls>Rāghavānanda</ls> on <ls>Ms. 8. 7.</ls>
